title-group.article-title: Chapter 2: DERRIDA AS A PROFOUND HUMANIST

ref.mixed-citation: Derrida's letter fragment where he maintains "Deconstruction ... is not neutral. It intervenes " (p. 91 and p. 93, respectively).
